text:
Food was nice although quite expensive for its quality. The pizza was quite thin and hard, not recommended. Mac and cheese was nice. Beef burger was good and big.

KTV selection was quite ample with QR code song selection option. Rooms aren't very soundproof as I could hear someone singing from afar.

Got to give a very good review for what we just done at this amazing place !
We got our ROM and small wedding here on 29/12/2024 , thanks to 7th heaven this one stop include food , decor and facility as well!

Lynn was so helpful to make it what we want the vibe and the decor all.
All staff are so friendly and kind ! Food are also delicious!
Most important to everyone that the price it’s definitely worth and acceptable! ❤️

Strongly recommend if you looking for a place to held ur any event !!!

Our ROM at 7th heaven cafe was absolutely magical. From the moment we stepped onto the property, we were in awe of its beauty. The staff was incredibly professional and accommodating, making sure everything went smoothly. The attention to detail, from the decorations to the food, was impeccable.

hosted our ROM and small afterparty here, and everything went super smoothly and exceeded our expectations right from the get-go. many thanks to Lynn and her team for helping us plan and execute our special day successfully!

side note, the honey paprika wings are 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻 definitely a must have

We had my niece’s 18th Birthday at 7th Heaven KTV and Cafe. From inquiry, planning, event day all the way to after party follow up, we’ve felt so much at home with Lynn. We’re so grateful for the whole team’s warm hospitality and help in making sure my niece’s debut will be smooth, stress-free and a huge success! We had such a wonderful time with the at 7th Heaven! Thank you and we’ll definitely come back! 🥰🙏🏻👏🏻
